pages.text: By using zylex and luminis, the materials used in buddycards that give it's special properties, you can enhance Buddysteel to increase it's connection with your collection. It can be extremely useful, as once you finish your collection, it will more powerful than maxed out buddysteel

pages.title: P-Buddysteel Blend
pages.text: In order to make perfect buddysteel, you must first make perfect buddysteel blend. This requires a bit of buddysteel, zylex, and luminis, both in a massive amount and a more concentrated item form.

pages.title: P-Buddysteel Ingot
pages.text: To forge perfect buddysteel, the perfect buddysteel blend must be smelted for longer than normal buddysteel. If you are planning to make a lot of it, it is reccomended to have multiple blast furnaces.
